docs.text: 縮圖: 成品 教程: 素材載點 在場景頂部插入圖片,和輸入文字。 設定左邊的西瓜為"子彈"、"出界銷毀"、"接受點擊"和名稱為"move"。 設定右邊的西瓜為名稱為"stop"。 在事件表內，新建事件->添加事件->System->每X秒->時間: 1 -> 按確定。 添加動件->精灵"stop"->制造->選擇一個對象"move"->垂直偏移"100"-> 按確定。 按"預覽運行"得到下圖效果。 修改右邊的西瓜為"子彈"、"與剛體碰撞"、"參與碰撞:是"。 兩個牆都設定為"剛體"。 新建全局變數->變數名"score"。 在事件表內，新建事件->添加事件->精灵"move"->當按下時。 添加動件->精灵"move"->銷毀。 添加動件->System->全局變量"加法"->全局變量選"score",值"1"->按確定。 添加動件->文本->文本內容->設置文本內容:"得分"+System.score 新建場景"newScene1"->新增文字和圖片"重設" 圖片設定"接受點擊", 文字設定名稱"score" 在MainScene場景,新建全局變數->變數名"timer",值"60" 添加動件->System->減法->全局變量選"timer",值"1"->按確定 新建事件->System->比較全局變量->全局變量選"timer",值"0"->按確定 添加動件->System->跳轉到指定場景->場景名"newScene1" 在MainScene場景,新建事件->System->場景初始化完成 添加動件->文本"score"->文本內容->設置文本內容:"得分"+System.score 新建事件->精靈"重設按鈕"->當按下時 添加動件->System->跳轉到指定場景->場景名"MainScene" 添加動件->System->全局變量"設置值"->全局變量"timer",值"60" 添加動件->System->全局變量"設置值"->全局變量"score",值"0" 按"預覽運行",完成遊戲。

docs.text: 縮圖: 成品 教程: 素材載點 1- 在場景"newScene1", 插入圖片, 和輸入文字。 2- 新增場景 MainScene, newScene2, newScene3。 3- 在場景"newScene1"事件表, 插入全局變量 level, pinNum。 4- 在事件表內，新建事件->添加條件->System->場景初始化完成; 添加動件->文本->文本內容->設置文本內容,"關卡:"+System.level-> 按確定; 添加動件->System->設置值->pinNum= 5+System.level*2 -> 按確定。 5- 在事件表內，新建事件->添加條件->精靈startBtn->當按下時; 添加動件->System-> 跳轉到指定場景-> 場景名:MainScene。 6- 在事件表內，新建事件->添加條件->精靈resetBtn->當按下時; 添加動件->System->設置值->level=0 ; 添加動件->文本->文本內容->設置文本內容,"關卡:"+System.level 。 7- 在場景"MainScene", 插入圖片, 和輸入文字。

docs.text: *程式1 import pgzrun WIDTH = 500 #視窗闊度 HEIGHT = 500 #視窗高度 #加入角色 alien = Actor('alien',(100,60)) def draw(): screen.clear() alien.draw() pgzrun.go() *程式2 import pgzrun import random WIDTH = 500 #視窗闊度 HEIGHT = 500 #視窗高度 timer = 60 #角色出現的時間 pgbd2 = Actor('pagebg2') alien = Actor('alien',(100,60)) score=0 #得分 def draw(): #畫面作圖 screen.clear() pgbd2.draw() alien.draw() screen.draw.text(str(score),(30,30),fontsize=50,color='green') def update(): #畫面更新 global timer #載入共公變量 timer -= 1 if timer <0: alien.x = random.randint(10,500) alien.y = random.randint(10,500) timer = 60 def on_mouse_down(pos): global score, timer #載入共公變量 if alien.collidepoint(pos): sounds.eep.play() alien.x = random.randint(10,500) alien.y = random.randint(10,500) timer = 60 score = score + 1 pgzrun.go() *程式3(完整代碼) import pgzrun import random WIDTH = 500 #視窗闊度 HEIGHT = 500 #視窗高度 timer = 60 #角色出現的時間 timer2 = 5000 #遊戲一局的時間 page=1 #頁面數 pgbd1 = Actor('pagebg1') pgbd2 = Actor('pagebg2') btn1 = Actor('btn1',(250,300)) btn2 = Actor('btn2',(250,400)) alien = Actor('alien',(100,60)) score=0 #得分 def draw(): #畫面作圖 global timer2,page #載入共公變量 screen.clear() if page == 1: #開始頁面 pgbd1.draw() btn1.draw() if page == 2: #遊戲頁面 pgbd2.draw() alien.draw() screen.draw.text(str(score),(30,30),fontsize=50,color='green') if timer2 < 0: btn2.draw() def update(): #畫面更新 global timer,timer2,page #載入共公變量 timer -= 1 timer2 -= 1 if timer2 < 0: return if timer <0: alien.x = random.randint(10,500) alien.y = random.randint(10,500) timer = 60 def on_mouse_down(pos): global score, timer,timer2,page #載入共公變量 if btn1.collidepoint(pos): page=2 if alien.collidepoint(pos) and timer2>0: sounds.eep.play() alien.x = random.randint(10,500) alien.y = random.randint(10,500) timer = 60 score = score + 1 if btn2.collidepoint(pos) and timer2<0: page = 1 score = 0 timer2 = 5000 pgzrun.go()

docs.text: 文件架構 ├── images/ │ └── background.png │ └── bird1.png │ └── bottom.png │ └── top.png └── intro.py 程式架構 def draw(): pass def update(): pass def on_mouse_down(): pass 第一步, 把角色、背景、障礙物畫入畫布 WIDTH = 350 HEIGHT = 600 background=Actor('background') bird = Actor('bird1',(75,200)) bar_up=Actor('top',(300,0)) bar_down=Actor('bottom',(300,800)) def draw(): screen.clear() background.draw() bar_up.draw() bar_down.draw() bird.draw() 第二步, 移動角色和障礙物 rate = 2 def update(): global rate bird.y=bird.y + rate bar_up.x=bar_up.x - rate bar_down.x=bar_down.x - rate 第三步, 點擊滑鼠小鳥上升 def on_mouse_down(): bird.y=bird.y-100 第四步, 判斷勝負 score = 0 def draw(): global score screen.clear() background.draw() bar_up.draw() bar_down.draw() bird.draw() screen.draw.text(str(score),(30,30),fontsize=50,color='green') def update(): global score, rate bird.y=bird.y + rate bar_up.x=bar_up.x - rate bar_down.x=bar_down.x - rate if bar_up.x<0: bar_up.x=WIDTH bar_down.x=WIDTH bar_up.y=random.randint(-200,200) bar_down.y=800+bar_up.y score=score+1 # 判斷勝負 if bird.colliderect(bar_up) or bird.colliderect(bar_down) or bird.y<0 or bird.y>HEIGHT: rate = 0 def on_mouse_down(): global rate if rate > 0: bird.y=bird.y-100

docs.text: 文件架 ├── images/ │ └── needle.png └── intro.py 程式架構 def draw(): pass def update(): pass def on_key_down(): pass 第一步, 把針和圓形畫入畫布 startNeedle= Actor('needle', anchor=(170+50, 1.5)) startNeedle.x =200 startNeedle.y = 300 def draw(): global rotateSpeed screen.fill('white') startNeedle.draw() # 畫紅色實心圓 screen.draw.filled_circle((400,300) , 80 , 'red') 第二步, 使針旋轉 startNeedle= Actor('needle', anchor=(170+50, 1.5)) startNeedle.x =400 startNeedle.y = 300 def update(): global rotateSpeed startNeedle.angle += rotateSpeed 第三步, 增加針 startNeedle= Actor('needle', anchor=(170+50, 1.5)) startNeedle.x =200 startNeedle.y = 300 needles = [] rotateSpeed = 1 def draw(): global rotateSpeed screen.fill('white') startNeedle.draw() for needle in needles: needle.draw() screen.draw.filled_circle((400,300) , 80 , 'red') screen.draw.text(str(score) , (50,250) , fontsize=50 , color='green') def update(): global rotateSpeed for needle in needles: needle.angle += rotateSpeed def on_key_down(): newNeedle=Actor('needle' ,anchor=(170+50, 1.5)) newNeedle.x=400 newNeedle.y=300 needles.append(newNeedle) 第四步, 判斷勝負 startNeedle= Actor('needle', anchor=(170+50, 1.5)) startNeedle.x =200 startNeedle.y = 300 needles = [] rotateSpeed = 1 score = 0 def draw(): global rotateSpeed screen.fill('white') startNeedle.draw() for needle in needles: needle.draw() screen.draw.filled_circle((400,300) , 80 , 'red') screen.draw.text(str(score) , (50,250) , fontsize=50 , color='green') if rotateSpeed == 0: screen.draw.text('Game Over!' , (1,320) , fontsize=35 , color='red') def update(): global rotateSpeed for needle in needles: needle.angle += rotateSpeed def on_key_down(): global rotateSpeed, score newNeedle=Actor('needle' ,anchor=(170+50, 1.5)) newNeedle.x=400 newNeedle.y=300 for needle in needles: if newNeedle.colliderect(needle): rotateSpeed = 0 if rotateSpeed > 0: score += 1 needles.append(newNeedle)

docs.text: 建立背景動畫 WIDTH = 300 HEIGHT = 600 background1 = Actor('background', (300/2, -300)) background2 = Actor('background', (300/2, 300)) def draw(): screen.clear() background1.draw() background2.draw() def update(): if background1.y > 900: background1.y = -300 if background2.y > 900: background2.y = -300 background1.y +=1 background2.y +=1 建立飛機 * 最後完整代碼 ```python import random WIDTH = 300 HEIGHT = 600 background1 = Actor('background', (300/2, -300)) background2 = Actor('background', (300/2, 300)) hero = Actor('hero',(WIDTH/2, HEIGHT*2/3)) bullet = Actor('bullet',(100,-HEIGHT)) enemy = Actor('enemy',(150,0)) score = 0 isLoose = False def draw(): screen.clear() background1.draw() background2.draw() hero.draw() bullet.draw() enemy.draw() screen.draw.text('Score:'+str(score), (200,10), fontsize=30, color='black') if isLoose: screen.draw.text('Game Over', (50,300), fontsize=50, color='red') def update(): global score, isLoose if isLoose: return if background1.y > 900: background1.y = -300 if background2.y > 900: background2.y = -300 background1.y +=1 background2.y +=1 if bullet.y > -HEIGHT: bullet.y = bullet.y - 10 enemy.y += 3 if enemy.y > HEIGHT: enemy.y = 0 enemy.x = random.randint(80,300) if bullet.colliderect(enemy): sounds.got_enemy.play() enemy.y = 0 enemy.x = random.randint(80,300) score += 1 bullet.y = -HEIGHT if hero.colliderect(enemy): sounds.explode.play() isLoose = True hero.image = 'hero_blowup' def on_mouse_move(pos, rel, buttons): global isLoose if isLoose: return hero.x=pos[0] hero.y=pos[1] def on_mouse_down(): global isLoose if isLoose: return sounds.gun.play() bullet.x = hero.x bullet.y = hero.y -70
docs.title: pygameZero 4 飛機大戰

docs.text: 完整代碼 import pgzrun import random WIDTH = 600 HEIGHT = 800 isLoose = False score = 0 playerSpeed = 5 brickSpeed = 1 alien = Actor('alien', (300,400)) lastAlienY = alien.y bricks= [] for i in range(5): brick = Actor('brick', (100*(i+1), 150*(i+1))) bricks.append(brick) def draw(): global score, isLoose screen.clear() alien.draw() for brick in bricks: brick.draw() screen.draw.text('Score:'+str(score), (400,20), fontsize=40, color='white') if isLoose: screen.draw.text('Game Over!', (150,300), fontsize=60, color='red') def update(): global playerSpeed, brickSpeed, isLoose, score, lastAlienY isPlayOnGround = False for brick in bricks: if abs(alien.bottom-brick.top)<5 \ and brick.left-alien.left < alien.width*2/3 \ and alien.right - brick.right < alien.width*2/3: isPlayOnGround = True alien.bottom = brick.top if lastAlienY < alien.y: score += 1 if keyboard.left: alien.x -= playerSpeed if keyboard.right: alien.x += playerSpeed lastAlienY = alien.y if not isPlayOnGround: alien.y += 5 for brick in bricks: brick.y -= brickSpeed if bricks[0].top < 10: del bricks[0] brick = Actor('brick') brick.x = random.randint(100,500) brick.y = HEIGHT bricks.append(brick) if alien.top < 0 or alien.bottom > HEIGHT: playerSpeed = 0 brickSpeed = 0 isLoose = True pgzrun.go()

docs.text: 完整代碼 import pgzrun import time import random TILE_SIZE = 20 WIDTH = 40*TILE_SIZE HEIGHT = 30*TILE_SIZE snakeHead = Actor('snake', (WIDTH/2, HEIGHT/2)) cookie = Actor('cookie') cookie.x = random.randint(11,29)*TILE_SIZE cookie.y = random.randint(11,29)*TILE_SIZE Snake = [] Snake.append(snakeHead) direction = 'right' isLoose = False score = 0 for i in range(4): snakebody = Actor('snake') snakebody.x = Snake[i].x -TILE_SIZE snakebody.y = Snake[i].y Snake.append(snakebody) def draw(): global score, isLoose screen.clear() for snakebody in Snake: snakebody.draw() cookie.draw() screen.draw.text('Score:'+str(score), (360,20), fontsize=40, color='white') if isLoose: screen.draw.text('Game Over!', (180, HEIGHT/2-100), fontsize=100, color='blue') def update(): global direction,isLoose if isLoose: return if keyboard.left: direction='left' if keyboard.right: direction='right' if keyboard.up: direction='up' if keyboard.down: direction='down' def moveSnake(): global direction, score, isLoose if isLoose: return newSnakeHead = Actor('snake') if direction == 'right': newSnakeHead.x = Snake[0].x + TILE_SIZE newSnakeHead.y = Snake[0].y if direction == 'left': newSnakeHead.x = Snake[0].x - TILE_SIZE newSnakeHead.y = Snake[0].y if direction == 'up': newSnakeHead.x = Snake[0].x newSnakeHead.y = Snake[0].y - TILE_SIZE if direction == 'down': newSnakeHead.x = Snake[0].x newSnakeHead.y = Snake[0].y + TILE_SIZE if newSnakeHead.y<0 or newSnakeHead.y > HEIGHT \ or newSnakeHead.x<0 or newSnakeHead.x>WIDTH: isLoose =True for snakebody in Snake: if newSnakeHead.x == snakebody.x \ and newSnakeHead.y == snakebody.y: isLoose = True break if newSnakeHead.x == cookie.x and newSnakeHead.y ==cookie.y: cookie.x = random.randint(5, 35)*TILE_SIZE cookie.y = random.randint(5, 25)*TILE_SIZE score +=1 else: del Snake[len(Snake)-1] Snake.insert(0, newSnakeHead) #time.sleep(0.2) clock.schedule_unique(moveSnake, 0.2) moveSnake() pgzrun.go()

docs.text: 格式工廠（FormatFactory）- 免費萬用多媒體轉檔工具，可以把所有影片轉成MP4、3GP、MPG、AVI、WMV、FLV、SWF檔，把所有音樂轉成MP3、WMA、MMF、AMR、OGG、M4A、WAV檔，還有圖片轉檔、擷取DVD影片、抓音軌、任何影片轉到自定義影片、幫影片加入浮水印（支援PNG、BMP、JPG）...等功能。 官方網站：Free Time 軟體性質：免費軟體 介面語言：繁體中文（含多國語系） 系統需求：Windows 10/8.x/7/Vista/XP（32及64位元） 下載載點1 官方說明： 格式工廠是套萬能的多媒體格式轉換軟件． 提供以下功能： 所有類型視頻轉到MP4/3GP/MPG/AVI/WMV/FLV/SWF。 所有類型音頻轉到MP3/WMA/MMF/AMR/OGG/M4A/WAV。 所有類型圖片轉到JPG/BMP/PNG/TIF/ICO/...。 抓取DVD到視頻文件，抓取音樂CD到音頻文件。 MP4文件支持iPod/iPhone/PSP/BlackBerry等指定格式。 源文件支持RMVB。 格式工廠的特長： 1 支持幾乎所有類型多媒體格式到常用的幾種格式． 2 轉換過程中可以修復某些損壞的視頻文件． 3 多媒體檔案減肥． 4 支持iPhone/iPod/PSP等多媒體指定格式． 5 轉換圖片文件支持縮放，旋轉，水印等功能． 6 DVD視頻抓取功能，輕鬆備份DVD到本地硬盤.
